en.title: FE Donates RM 10,000 to Police Charity Golf, Penang, 18th April 2009!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE LEADER ADAM FUNG. 

The Police Charity Golf Event, Penang “Sumbangan Untuk Aktivitiy Sambutan Peringatan Hari Polis Ke 202 Anjuran Kontinjen Pulau Pinang” was “Teed-Off” by the Honorable Chief Police Officer (CPO) of Penang DCP Dato' Wira Ayub Bin Haji Yaakob on the 18th April 2009 @ 8.45am. This year's Police Day is aimed towards the participation of the public with the police in order to have close ties and cooperation amongst the police and the public in crime prevention and security aspects. One of the activities to achieve this aim is through Golf. 

Among the VIP guests who played on the day was the former Inspector General Of Police (IGP) Tan Sri Rahim Noor, Chief Police Officer Of Penang, Dato' Wira Ayub, Deputy Director General Operation Force Bukit Aman DCP Dato' Salleh Md. Rasid, Deputy CPO of Penang SAC I Dato' Tun Hisan, Officer In Charge Of Criminal Investigations Penang SAC II Wan Abdullah, other Senior Police Officers and corporate figures. In total there were about 114 participants. 

After the 18th hole, everyone proceeded to the Luncheon Hall where the Honorable Governor of Penang Tuan Yang Terutama Yang DiPertua Negeri Pulau Pinang, Tun Dato Seri Utama (Dr.) Hj. Abdul Rahman B. Hj. Abbas graced the luncheon.During the luncheon the CPO of Penang thanked FusionExcel International for their kind contribution to make the Golf Event a success. Jean Daniels, representing FE, presented the mock cheque of RM 10,000.00 to the CPO of Penang as well as FE products to the Honorable Governor of Penang , the Honorable Former IGP Tan Sri Rahim Noor, the Honorable CPO of Penang DCP Dato' Wira Ayub, the Honorable Deputy Director Of General Operation Force Bukit Aman DCP Dato' Salleh and the Honorable Deputy CPO of Penang SAC I Dato' Tun Hisan.Jean Daniels also presented a Quantum Pendant to the Honorable OCCI of Penang SAC II Tuan Wan Abdullah. Jean Daniels again demonstrated how FE's Quantum Pendant is effective for golfers especially how they can achieve extra strength, better balance and greater flexibility. Both the Honorable Governor of Penang, Tun Dato Seri Hj. Abdul Rahman Abbas and the Honorable former IGP, Tan Sri Rahim Noor remarked that it is a proud day for Malaysians to hear that FusionExcel International has established itself worldwide and won the prestigious 2008 Super Excellent Brand Award! 

AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!! 



The Golf Activity Morning started off with a Group Photo Session.
 
Demo Presentation by Mr. Jean Daniels, FE's Spokesman. Jean explained why he started using 
FE's Scalar Energy Products and gave some tips to the audience on how to play golf as well 
as how to have good and easy Tee-Offs.
Jean Daniels with Tan Sri Rahim Noor, Former Malaysian Inspector General of Police, Tun Dato 
Seri Utama Hj Abdul Rahman, Governor of 
Penang, Dato Wira Ayup, CPO of Penang, 
Dato Salleh Md Rasid, Deputy Commisioner 
of Police (Bukit Aman).		 Jean Daniels with Tuan Wan Abdullah, 
Senior Assitant Commissioner II, Penang OCCI 
(Officer in Charge of Criminal Investigations Dept).
